divs: sighting detailsstar like object aprox 205 degrees and 35 degress above horizon, at first looks like planet or bright star but after short time can see object move around, some up\down then orbital movement, some change in light intensity and color, observed in the exact same place two nights in a row at same time, last about two hours then gone both nights. first night i talked myself into optical illusion or tempurater inversion, however second night (28th) i took more time and changed my line of sight to object and my elivation in rtelation to object by going up incline about 1000 ft. no change in apperance of light or erratic movement?? i am not leanning to any conclusions as of yet and expect a duh moment at any time ( i hope not) i do have a proffessional background in areas that should lean to my knowing wtfudge this is. just wondering if you guys have a simple answer. i feel strange not knowing what it is i am looking at. thanks i am a huge fan of your work
trends: There have been no other sightings in Adger
This sighting has never been favorited.
